message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's truly exceptional and I believe it would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $15,000 for the product.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While I agree the product looks great, $15,000 is a bit outside my budget. I'm interested, but I could only consider a price closer to $8,000.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. To better align with your needs, I propose a price of $10,000 for the product. This still allows us to maintain a fair profit margin while providing you with the value you're seeking.
